"Destruye la fuente de poder del barco!":
"After defeating the enemies,
board the ship and destroy the power source!"

"After defeating the enemies,
board the ship and destroy the power source!"
"Tch, a warship has surfaced. It's gonna be trouble if you just leave it and it bombards you. Deal with it ASAP."
"I'm transporting a catapult to your location. Use it to board the ship and take out its power source."
"The ship has gone silent. That'll put a stop to the bombardments. Nice work."
"Parece que finalmente se quedo sin jugo ... Bueno, lo que sea. Debe volver a su mision."
"Un barco ha salido a la superficie. Lo que le permite continuar con su bombardeo eso es peligroso. Solicito su apoyo para tratar con esto urgentemente."
"Una catapulta ha sido transferida para poder saltar a la nave, a continuacion, destruya su fuente de alimentacion."
"Hemos confirmado la desaparicion de energia emitida del barco. Su rendimiento ha sido admirable."
"With the target's energy down to zero, we've confirmed it has come to an automatic stop. All operatives are requested to return to their regular mision."
